description: Array of recording file objects recovered.

id.description: Unique Identifier for Recording File. Recording File ID.

recording_start.description: The date and time at which recording started.

recording_end.description: The date and time at which recording ended.

file_size.description: The size of the recording file in bytes.

play_url.description: The URL of the file using which it can be opened and played.

download_url.description: The URL using which the file can be downloaded.

status.description:
Status of the recording.
`completed`: Recording has been completed.
